title: Official League of Legends Comics
body:
Is there a page with links to all of the official LoL comics, or do you just have to scavenge across the universe site to find them all?

I have a friend that likes comics and I would like to send him them to read but I don't want to have to send him a bunch of links and make it hard to keep track of.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, you have to look in every character page that you know has a comic. 
There are still details that Riot needs to solve in the universe page, frankly.
